scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const fs=require('fs'); const readme=fs.readFileSync('README.md','utf8'); fs.writeFileSync('README.md', readme.replace(/version-\d+\.\d+\.\d+-blue/g, 'version-'+pkg.version+'-blue').replace(/santa-games:\d+\.\d+\.\d+/g, 'santa-games:'+pkg.version))"
